attributes.action: Challenge to Environment Secretary (David Milliband MP) to place recycling boxes in every classroom in the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long the Government has gone on about the environment and recycling. One of the most obvious ways of lowering the number of trees we cut down for paper is to put free recycling boxes in every classroom in the country.

If Mr Milliband were to see the amount of paper that is wasted day after day in Britain's schools he would see this is the best place to start.

rejection.details: There are 2 petition with the same details.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
